  • Constructor Details

    • TTT_MySQL

      public TTT_MySQL(String host, String username, String password, String database)
      Parameterized constructor to connect to any MySQL DB on any MySQL DBMS.
      Parameters:
      host - where is the DBMS?
      username - who are you?
      password - what is your password?
      database - which database do you wish to use?

  • Method Details

    • retrieve

      public String retrieve(String SQLCmd)
      Used to retrieve information from a table.
      Parameters:
      SQLCmd - The SELECT query you wish to run.
      Returns:
      The result of the query encoded as a comma separated list of fields with a new line for each row.

    • update

      public String update(String SQLCmd)
      Used to update information in a table.
      Parameters:
      SQLCmd - The UPDATE command you wish to run.
      Returns:
      either how many rows were updated or the text string "ERROR".

    • insert

      public String insert(String SQLCmd)
      Used to insert information into a table.
      Parameters:
      SQLCmd - The INSERT query you wish to run.
      Returns:
      either how many rows were inserted or the text string "ERROR".

    • remove

      public String remove(String SQLCmd)
      Used to remove data from a table.
      Parameters:
      SQLCmd - The DELETE query you wish to run.
      Returns:
      either how many rows were removed or the text string "ERROR".

    • close

      public void close()
      Used to close all objects used to talk with the DB and DBMS.
